channel.title: Golang on Mobile Robot I/O
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Mobile Robot I/O

item.title: The Go Periph Library
item.description: Periph provides a lot of useful utilitie along with example source code to help start developing our own interactions.

item.title: Otto the Pluggable Macro Controller Micro Service
item.description: Otto is a small, simple micro-server written in Go. It handles requisit communications and related infra structure required by servers and controllers. The applications and functionality will be provided via pluggins. Otto can run as a REST server in a data center or the controller on micro-controller type of computer. Otto was developed with the notion that much of the code that makes for a good server (or any application for that matter) requires redundant but import supporting infrastructure.
